crane
crane is a tool that we built to help
with stateful application migrations
across kubernetes clusters
a typical use case of crane could be
that
maybe you have an older cluster and you
have an application that's been running
there for a year or two
and now you have a new cluster it's up
and you want to migrate
that application to the new cluster an
important thing is that
a lot of these applications want to
migrate they may have state
so you can't just redeploy the
application you need to be able to
migrate it and bring that state with you
and crane is the tool that we built
about with that
when we talk about a stateful
application there
are essentially three buckets of things
that make up that application
there are kubernetes resources this
could be your deployments secrets
services things like that
there could be potentially internal
images that were built for the
application that are required to run
and then also state and persistent
volume data and crane will migrate all
those three things
to the destination cluster so your
application will be running and you'll
have that state
in the destination cluster that you
originally had in the source
i just want to call it under the covers
crane uses several tools to accomplish
this
and one of the popular tools that we use
is valero valero is helping us to
do a lot of the backup and restore
operations to enable this migration
i just want to show you quickly how you
can install crane if you have

you can search for crane
